segments.text: yes . I bought a scarf yesterday . It's really nice and warm . Have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's made of wool . I like the striped pattern .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I adore simple fashions . How does it look on me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it looks great , but you need something to go with it . It's too plain on its own .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's a good idea . When did you buy it ? Is it a name brand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but I bought it when it was on sale , 50 % off the original price . OK , what do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that looks lovely . Just one more thing---you need a pair of earrings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a pair of pearl earrings . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you have good fashion sense , Karen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thanks . We should be ourselves . There are so many fashion victims out there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but with our sense we'll always look good .
segments.speaker: S2
